title: Enhancing App Development Practical Competencies: Gamification Simulation for Reducing HIV/AIDS Stigma

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply appropriate communication skills for individuals with HIV/AIDS with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can propose solutions to discrimination scenarios in healthcare settings with 90% accuracy across 10+ simulation scenarios.
Learners can plan and execute stigma-reduction campaigns in real-world settings based on knowledge acquired through game missions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
